description: This file contains implementation of listeners and notifier classes related to process container state changes within the Thunder framework. It provides methods to add, remove, and notify listeners about state changes and window events.

classes.name: AWCStateChangeNotifier
classes.description: Class responsible for managing listeners that are interested in application state changes and notifying them.

classes.name: AWCListener
classes.description: Class that receives notifications about window and application state changes, and forwards notifications to the associated notifier.

methods.name: void addListener(AWCStateChangeListener * listener)
methods.description: Adds a listener to the notifier if it isn't already registered.

methods.name: void removeListener(AWCStateChangeListener * listener)
methods.description: Removes a specified listener from the notifier.

methods.name: void notify(int req_id,awc::awc_app_state_t app_state,int status,unsigned int pid)
methods.description: Notifies all registered listeners of an application state change.

methods.name: AWCListener::notifyWindowChange
methods.description: Placeholder for window change notifications; currently empty.

methods.name: AWCListener::notifyStateChange
methods.description: Handles application state change notifications and forwards them to the notifier.

methods.name: AWCListener::notifyServiceReady
methods.description: Placeholder for service readiness notification; currently does nothing.

methods.name: void notifyStateChange(int req_id,awc::awc_app_state_t app_state,int status,unsigned int pid)
void notifyWindowChange(int window_id VARIABLE_IS_NOT_USED,awc::AWCClient::awc_window_state_t window_state VARIABLE_IS_NOT_USED,unsigned int pid VARIABLE_IS_NOT_USED)

ctags.name: notify
ctags.pattern: /^void AWCStateChangeNotifier::notify(int req_id, awc::awc_app_state_t app_state, int status, unsi/

ctags.name: notifyStateChange
ctags.pattern: /^void AWCListener::notifyStateChange(int req_id, awc::awc_app_state_t app_state, int status, unsi/

ctags.name: notifyWindowChange
ctags.signature: (int window_id VARIABLE_IS_NOT_USED,awc::AWCClient::awc_window_state_t window_state VARIABLE_IS_NOT_USED,unsigned int pid VARIABLE_IS_NOT_USED)
